aria-label=Click here to review Rates and fees for the Reflect card. Opens over this page. Close to continue. <br id="endPaste" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />

aria-label=Click here to learn more about the Reflect card. Opens in a new browser window. <br id="endPaste" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />
feature4_content:
0% intro APR for 21 months from account opening on purchases and qualifying balance transfers

After that, your variable APR will be 17.74%, 24.24% or 28.49%

Balance transfers made within 120 days from account opening qualify for the intro rate
